item.title: CVE-2024-24848|2024-02-05T06:11:26.580Z -- MJS Software -- PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MJS Software PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy: from n/a through 1.0.4.
